pageProps.content:
Experience

Lion Sands Hi’Nkweni Villa is an exclusive & private piece of paradise in the Kruger National Parks’ Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.
The villa is part of Lion Sands Tinga Lodge but operates & functions privately so that guests have an exclusive safari experience.
The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities. Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

Stay

Hi’Nkweni meaning ‘together’ in the local Shangaan language, is for special moments shared with your tribe. Lion Sands Hi’Nkweni Villa was carefully designed for this purpose.
The 2-bedroom exclusive villa includes a dedicated guide, vehicle, chef & butler – making it ideal for families or groups looking to enjoy a private safari experience.
Each of the 2 en-suite bedrooms has space for an additional children’s bed & are linked together to create a spacious 6-sleeper offering, complete with private living areas. For larger families or groups, the neighbouring 2-sleeper suite can be booked in conjunction with Hi’Nkweni Villa, allowing 8 guests to enjoy Hi’Nkweni’s exclusive facilities.
The main area includes a kitchen, dining area, lounge as well as a patio with deck & pool.
All spaces at Lion Sands Hi’Nkweni Villa have been carefully designed to bring people together.

Activities

A variety of exciting activities are offered. The most popular is their open 4x4 game drives & bush walks. Guest can get close encounters with some of Africa’s wildest animals.
A highlight for most is spending a night in Tinyeleti Treehouse, a romantic treehouse set up in a remote corner of the bush, not too far from camp. Guests can enjoy a private dinner in their treehouse before falling asleep under the stars.
Other exciting activities include spa treatments & community initiatives.

subfolders.title: Hamiltons Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp takes you back to an era where grace & style were the epitome of luxurious living.  Named after Colonel Stephenson Hamilton who was instrumental in establishing the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp offers guests a luxurious safari adventure in a remote & pristine bush setting.

subfolders.title: Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: An earthy, traditional Tsonga-styled camp, Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge offers a unique safari experience on the banks of the Mluwati River in the heart of the Kruger National Park. Located in a private concession, off-road game driving is permitted & guests can therefore expect close encounters with Africa’s Big 5 in a remote & pristine wilderness environment.

subfolders.title: Imbali Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Imbali Safari Lodge offers excellent Big 5 game viewing throughout the year. Imbali aims to provide their guests with superb hospitality, exceptional service & gastronomic excellence – ensuring an unforgettable safari experience.

subfolders.title: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp enjoys a unique & remote setting in the far north of the Kruger National Park.   The concession lies in a vast triangle between the Limpopo & Luvuhu Rivers along South Africa’s northeastern frontier.  Between them, the two great valleys embrace one of Africa’s most spectacular landscapes with mountains and gorges in the west giving way to plains, pans, baobabs and fever tree forests in the east.

subfolders.description: The Singita brand of lodges offers a premier safari experience like no other!  Contemporary & luxurious in style, Singita will exceed expectations from beginning to end. The ultra-modern & beautifully decorated Singita Lebombo is located within a private concession in the Kruger National Park & boasts some of the best wildlife viewing in the country.
